text_ruling:
What happens if [Diviner](/en/card/30046) trashes a card with a play or install cost of 0?
>[Diviner](/en/card/30046) will not end the run.

What happens if [Diviner](/en/card/30046) trashes a card with play or install cost of X?
>[Diviner](/en/card/30046) will not end the run. A play or install cost of X is considered to be 0 until the card is played or installed.

Does [Diviner](/en/card/30046)’s subroutine require you to trash cards from HQ like [Anoetic Void](/en/card/30050)? 
>No. [Diviner](/en/card/30046)’s subroutine is checking the install/play cost of the card that was trashed from the Runner’s grip by the net damage.
